title: Peer Assessment-Based Language Proficiency Enhancement Simulation Training

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Real-Time Peer Evaluation Training Environment Using Smartphone-Based VR Simulations

learning_goals: Learners can apply privacy protection settings with 80% accuracy during the peer assessment process.
Learners can provide feedback on peers' language performance using a structured rubric at least three times.
After completing a pre-training module, learners can reduce negative emotional expressions by 50% during peer evaluations.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
